name: In My Arms
description:
A dutiful old man discovers his baby grandchild holds immense power, but cannot control it.  Therefore he must take the baby to the Witch who lives deep in the evil woods. Only she can teach the child how to wield this amazing magic. 

Lead Programmer:  Thomas Lucas

Art Director: John Gabriel

Lead Sound Engineer: Trevor Shaw

Music:  Fear - by: Patrick de Arteaga  - patrickdearteaga.com

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
